Teuchos::ConstValueTypeSerializationBuffer< Ordinal, T, Serializer > Class Template Reference

Encapsulate how an array of const objects with value sematics is serialized into a const char[] array. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer = typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType>
class Teuchos::ConstValueTypeSerializationBuffer< Ordinal, T, Serializer >

Encapsulate how an array of const objects with value sematics is serialized into a const char[] array.
